author: Ingrid Lunden
title: Stripe adds card issuing, localized card networks and expanded approvals tool
description: At a time when more transactions than ever are happening online, payments behemoth Stripe is announcing three new features to continue expanding its reach. The company today announced that it will now offer card issuing services directly to businesses to let …
content:
At a time when more transactions than ever are happening online, payments behemoth Stripe is announcing three new features to continue expanding its reach.
